ca.etsmtl.log430.lab1.buisness

Class Resource

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.etsmtl.log430.lab1.buisness.Resource

  • public class Resource
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines the Resource object for the system. Besides the basic attributes, there are two lists maintained. alreadyAssignedProjectList is a ProjectList object that maintains a list of projects that the resource was already assigned to prior to this execution of the system. projectsAssignedList is also a ProjectList object that maintains a list of projects assigned to the resource durint the current execution or session.
